data.name: Darker YouTube Essence
data.description:
Darker Style for YouTube since Big update (let's just say "enhanced build-in dark theme with animations n' all"). You can change the background by adding a url or uploading an image. (Choosing the same background for both header and body, makes it feels indistinguishable)

Icons are bluish(or chosen color) as in the screenshot preview, only if you sign-in on your account there.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch
